agent_d_renderer.purpose: Main terrain generation system - converts PCC to 3D scenes
agent_d_renderer.features: T17 Hero Planet system, deterministic seeding, 40+ terrain zones

agent_a_generator.purpose: Generates PCC game code and initial structures
agent_a_generator.note: Works with Agent D in evolution loop

agent_b_manual.purpose: Manual game testing and quality assessment

agent_c_supervisor.purpose: Provides evolutionary feedback to improve generation

PRODUCTION_MEMORY_SYSTEMS.status: PRODUCTION - Required for agent memory and learning

DEPRECATED_SYSTEMS.status: DEPRECATED - Use run_auto_loop.py and run_manual_loop.py instead

DEVELOPMENT_TESTING.status: DEVELOPMENT/TESTING - Not required for basic planet generation
